mdRecord.dcterms:title: Map of the field of operations of Gregg's (Union) & Stuart's (Confederate) Cavalry at the Battle of Gettysburg, July 3, 1863 / surveyed by Frank O. Maxson, C.E. under the direction of John B. Bachelder ; authorized by Act of Congress, approved June 9th, 1880
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Bachelder, John B. (John Badger), 1825-1894
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 73 x 30 cm. on sheet 91 x 46 cm.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: This issue does not include troop locations and does not have date and time printed in the lower margin.

Detailed topographic map with spot elevations and contours "given for every change of four feet in elevation ... Every object is represented, as nearly as possible, as it was at the time of the battle..."
Shows drainage, vegetation, roads, railroads, fences, and houses with names of residents.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Imperfect: discolored, mounted on linen. Signed in lower right margin: Lieut. Colonel H.C. Hasbrouck, U.S.A.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Gregg, David McMurtrie, 1833-1916
Stuart, Jeb, 1833-1864
